a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (22)

p.k:
Barbabright has a secret / Super duper cool Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.
The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project (2020).
